name: 1500 ANSI Official Licensed Google TV Smart Projector, HAPPRUN 4K Full HD Home Theater with Auto Focus, Dolby Sound, Wi-Fi Bluetooth, Built-in Apps, Compatible with Phone & PC, Indoor & Outdoor Use
short_description: [ Built-in Officially Licensed Google TV ]-Enjoy the reliability of an officially certified Google TV projector. Stream Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube, Hulu, and 10,000+ popular shows and movies—no extra TV stick or box required. Unlike generic projectors, our licensed Google TV system delivers automatic updates, smooth performance, and secure access to your favorite apps.

[ Google Voice Assistant ] -Control your 4K projector with just your voice. Simply press the mic button on the remote and say what you need—whether it’s launching Netflix, adjusting the volume, or finding your favorite movie. It makes your movie nights smarter and easier than ever.

[Visionary Picture Quality]-Bring the cinema home with stunning clarity and brightness. This native 1080P projector with 1500 ANSI lumens delivers sharp, detailed images that pop with depth. Featuring a premium triple-layer lens for vibrant colors and rich contrast, plus advanced image processing for smooth, crisp playback, it transforms any room into an immersive home theater with lifelike 4K big-screen visuals

[3s Auto Focus & Auto Keystone]-Experience effortless projection with our 4K smart projector. Equipped with a powerful processor and intelligent sensors, it instantly adjusts focus and alignment for sharp, vivid images—even on angled walls or tricky surfaces. Forget manual setup—just power on and enjoy crystal-clear viewing anywhere, from cozy movie nights at home to outdoor screenings under the stars.

[Dolby Audio & Hi-Fi Speakers]-Enjoy cinematic sound at home or outdoors with Dolby-certified audio. The HAPPRUN movie projector comes with Hi-Fi dual speakers and precision-tuned diaphragms that deliver deep, powerful bass and crisp, balanced treble. Bring cinema-quality sound to your backyard, camping trips, or family movie nights.

[Lag-Free Mirroring]-Enjoy seamless projection with advanced WiFi 6 technology that delivers ultra-low latency. Experience effortlessly smooth screen mirroring from iOS, Android, and Windows devices—all without the clutter of cables. This wireless WiFi projector is the ideal centerpiece for your home entertainment.

[ 5.2 Bluetooth Technology ] - Wirelessly connect the bluetooth projector to a premium sound system for enhanced audio quality, or stream to Bluetooth headphones for a private theater experience without disturbing others.

[Extra Large 200-inch Screen] – Transform any wall into your private theater with display sizes ranging from 40 to 200 inches. Whether you prefer 4:3 or 16:9 aspect ratios, the built-in 50%–100% zoom function makes it easy to adjust screen size without losing clarity. From family movie nights to outdoor parties, enjoy sharp, vivid, and richly detailed visuals on a breathtaking 200-inch screen.

[Multi-Device Compatible Projector]-Featuring HDMI, USB, and a 3.5mm audio jack, the HAPPRUN projector seamlessly connects to your phone, laptop, PC, TV stick, PS5, Switch, and more. Enjoy movies, gaming, meetings, or parties with one versatile device.
[Adaptable Installation for Any Space ]- HAPPRUN tv projector features a compact design with flexible installation options—desktop, tripod, wall, or ceiling, meeting different projection needs.
product_details: Special Features ‎Brightness: 1500 ANSI (38,000 Lumens) Resolution: Native 1080P Full HD, supports 4K input Contrast Ratio: 2000:1 with HDR10+ Projection Size: 50"–200" Zoom: 50%–100% digital zoom Smart Adjustment: Auto focus & auto keystone correction Wireless: Dual-band 5G/2.4G WiFi 6 Bluetooth: Two-way Bluetooth 5.2 Casting: Supports Google Cast, AirPlay & Google Phone Mirroring Audio: Hi-Fi speakers with Dolby Audio Cooling: Advanced low-noise cooling system Lamp Life: 10,000 hours durable LED light source

Featuring a 1080p FHD resolution and up to 300” ultra-large projection, it showcases clear and vivid visuals for presentations and vedio. With a high native contrast ratio achieved through its 0.65” DMD chip, this projector showcases captivating visuals even with low-light vedio scenes. It offers two HDMI ports for easy multimedia connectivity. Designed for enhanced functionality, it includes a USB-A output to power HDMI wireless dongles, eliminating the need for extra adapters. Whether tilted up or down, the auto V keystone feature ensures automatic image correction, keeping perfectly-aligned visuals. Maintenance is hassle-free – simply use a laptop and USB cable for software updates.

Switch effortlessly between your favorite shows and films—whether it's catching those unforgettable finale moments when hidden powers awaken or simply enjoying a lighthearted family movie night. Regular OTA updates keep features current, apps secure, and streaming stable.

[All-in-One Connectivity – Dual HDMI & USB, Wi-Fi 6] Equipped with 2×HDMI (HDMI 1 supporting CEC, HDMI 2 supporting ARC and CEC), 2×USB, top control buttons, 3.5mm audio output, and Wi-Fi 6 for AirPlay (iOS) and Miracast (Android & Windows), the P62 Pro offers more versatile connectivity than most projectors, which often have only one HDMI and one USB port. P62 Pro home projector brings everyone together with stunning, lifelike visuals.(Note: Videos labeled as 4K will display at a native resolution of 1080P, often termed '4K supported.')

HDMI ARC simplifies integration with soundbars or AV receivers-—perfect for enjoying live concerts, K-pop performances, or your favorite shows with immersive clarity.

You can not download other streaming apps. If you want to get more Apps, please choose the GTV Version.

Auto Focus, Auto Keystone Correction, Auto Obstacle avoidance, Auto Screen Alignment, 50%-100% Zoom: Enjoy instant auto-focus and crystal-clear images in seconds. It will automatically correct any keystone distortion within a range of vertical ±15°/horizontal ±15°. Zoom from 50% to 100% without needing to move the movie projector. Plus, it has auto obstacle avoidance and auto screen alignment, so the image always fits perfectly on the screen, no matter how you position the projector or the size of the projector screen.

3D Stereo, Dolby Audio Sound and Dual 8W Speakers: Enjoy deep, resonant audio and precise sound details that make you feel like you're part of the action with Dolby Audio and 3D stereo sound. The built-in 2x8W Digital speakers deliver crisp, powerful sound that fills the room, ensuring every viewing experience with the Aurzen D1 Smart Projector is a true sonic delight.

HDR10, Native 1080P and 4K Supported: HDR10 enhances contrast and color accuracy, making bright scenes brighter and dark scenes deeper, so every detail stands out and looks as rich and dynamic as intended. Native 1080P resolution provides you sharp and detailed visuals with full HD quality, perfect for watching movies, playing games, or viewing photos with stunning clarity. (Note: Ensure 4K devices, such as a TV stick, are connected via HD for video playback. Videos labeled as 4K will display at a native resolution of 1080P, often termed '4K supported').

5G/2.4G Dual-Band WiFi & Two-way Bluetooth 5.1: Aurzen EAZZE D1 projector offers a robust and versatile connectivity experience, with faster speeds, reduced interference, and improved audio quality with dual-band 5G/2.4G WiFi and Bluetooth. (Does not support WiFi 6） It supports two-way Bluetooth 5.1 audio transmission, allowing connection to mobile devices as a standalone stereo speaker or pairing with external Bluetooth speakers, headphones and soundbars to enhance audio effects for home projectors anytime and anywhere. Please note: Bluetooth function supports audio transmission only, not video.

Wide Compatibility Meets Multiple Projection Needs: The Aurzen D1 projector supports ceiling mount, tabletop mount, tripod mount, and wall mount with a 1/4'' screw hole at the bottom. It includes 1 HD port, 2 USB ports, and a 3.5mm headphone jack, making it compatible with TV Stick, Roku, laptops, iPhones, Android devices, iPads, USB drives, Switch/PS5, and more. It is also an amazing portable projector for indoor and outdoor movies, small meetings, outdoor camping, gaming, parties, studying, and business. Foldable Stand not included.

Aurzen Statement: Aurzen, we stand by true brightness, no exaggeration. As an industry leader in transparency, Aurzen's proactive SGS certification (ANSI/ISO 21118) guarantees honest brightness, cutting through exaggerated claims to ensure every detail is rendered with crisp, vibrant, and trustworthy clarity. SGS, a globally recognized testing and certification authority, it ensures the accuracy and credibility of our brightness standards.

Impressive Anniversary, Birthday and Christmas Gifts for Mom Dad Women and Men: Enjoy an exciting unboxing experience with Aurzen, well-known for the highest quality products. Especially suitable for Anniversary gifts, Christmas gifts, birthday gifts and various gift-giving occasions.
